channel.title: Stairs. [317]
channel.description:
Stairs ID = 4493
X: 3434
Y: 3537
I'd like to go to my slayer's tower second floor but I can't. Any ideas how to make stairs work ?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Stairs. [317]
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You need to change the heightLevel.

heightLevel = 0; - main floor
heightLevel = 1; - 2nd floor
heightLevel = 2; - 3rd floor

Read full topic

item.title: Stairs. [317]
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:1, topic:345342”]Stairs ID = 4493

X: 3434

Y: 3537

I’d like to go to my slayer’s tower second floor but I can’t. Any ideas how to make stairs work ?

Thanks in advance.[/quote]

case 4493:
if(absX == #### && absY == ####){ // X Y coords where the object is located
toX= 3434 // X coord of that floor
toY = 3537 // Y coord of that floor
}
break;

something like that
